message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take a small piece of the pie.  Let's get this over with!
Alice, that's not a good start.  Let's be reasonable - this offer ensures we both benefit before inflation eats our money!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split this more evenly before the value continues to drop.
Alice, it seems we both want a sizable share. This offer is fair and lets us both walk away with a good amount before inflation makes it pointless to argue!
